function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete coverage of virus propagation prevention indicators in LEED standards","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease propagation in built environments","Mitigation":"Update LEED standards to include indicators related to virus propagation prevention","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, air filtration and purification systems","People":"Occupants of built environments","Owner":"LEED standards committee"},{"Description":"Missing waste management and mental health subcategories in LEED standards","Impact":"Environmental and mental health concerns not adequately addressed","Mitigation":"Incorporate waste management and mental health subcategories into LEED standards","Technologies":"Waste sorting and recycling systems, mental health support programs","People":"Environmental stakeholders and building occupants","Owner":"LEED standards committee"},{"Description":"Lack of coverage for energy use and comfort indicators in LEED standards","Impact":"Energy inefficiency and lack of comfort in built environments","Mitigation":"Integrate energy use and comfort indicators into LEED standards","Technologies":"Energy management systems, comfort monitoring tools","People":"Building occupants, environmental stakeholders","Owner":"LEED standards committee"}]}
